Description: Bronze mirror-case; cast and hammered; flat disc with recurved rim; cable-border around the outer edge; edges of the disc are damaged and surface is much encrusted and eroded.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.83, Tomb 81 no. 3)
